title: 关于给玩家自由调整创造模式的权限
author: woshinidemama6
txt_content:
/mangdelp vip essentials.gamemode的权限给了
然后VIP的玩家输入/gm 1 提示 you do not have permission to change to gamemode creative 
怎么办 求大神

replies.author: pxiaotu
replies.txt_content:
/mangaddp vip essentials.gamemode    是给vip权限组添加 essentials.gamemode权限节点
/mangdelp vip essentials.gamemode     是删除vip权限组的 essentials.gamemode权限节点
